name: Holofit: Make Your Fitness Fun
summary:
Some call it a workout, we call it a game.

🪐 15+ virtual worlds: Tropical, Paris, Antarctica, Cyberpunk, and more

👟 Guided HIIT, Fat Burn, Cardio programs 

⭐️ Monthly & daily challenges to motivate you

🥇 Real-time multiplayer with friends or other members

🎉 Monthly updates with new features

🚴‍♀️ Works with rowers, bikes, ellipticals, or without any equipment with bodyweight exercises

🆓 7-day free trial, risk-free
